About Me

Hi, I'm Jy Alexander, I am currently a 3rd year Computer Programming & analysis student at Durham College

I love anything Tech, Science, or Car related.

My hobbies include ice skating, basketball, soccer, and going to the race track.

I LOVE seafood, i hope i don't develop an allergy some day but I wont let that stop me

I am a self proclaimed doer, i love doing things--whether it be trying new food, or trying a new experience, im here for it all
